title: PC March 25 - The mobilization in Taranto for Palestine with various initiatives - the flag of Palestine crosses the sea
content:
In the garrison/event for yesterday's Palestine were brought by Comrades of Communist proletarians new important objectives of complaint e of new initiatives, summarized by the banners, with the launch of Three campaignsPalestine/Imperialist intervention of Italy in Mar Red/against the G7-Guerra.

Also on Saturday they extended the Memberships to the #Iostoconlapalestine and contact committee, especially of girls who want to engage in solidarity with the Palestinian people; as well asvarious migrantsthat are active and then leave addresses.

The Striscioni then "sanctioned" 2 important military areas: the new Naval base and the military arsenalAgainst the imperialist mission in Mar Red on the side of the Houthi rebels.

A lot of speeches at the Microphone - we report. below, that of the former Ilva worker Slai COBAS - They brought a strong denunciation of the terrible situation of the population of Gaza, especially in hospitals, for women who cannot give birth, with direct testimony from nurses, doctors, Palestinian women; the need to link solidarity to Palestine to the elevation of the struggle against our imperialism and the government Melons accomplice; the clear and unequivocal denunciation of the nature of the State of Israel; the announcement of new initiatives.

To the morning posting of banners: "Puglia is not a war area no to G7 on our land "which launched the autonomous campaign on the G7.

By fishermen of Taranto, the flag of Palestine
crosses our sea

The sea of Taranto is not the area of war missions but of solidarity between peoples,With the Palestine!


We will return to manifest in front of the admiralty, like at the naval base; Together with an intervention at the Leonardo di Grottaglie Leader of military production for imperialist wars.

There continuation of the action on Palestine/Red Mar is now, it cannot "wait" the manifestation of April 25, as it actually emerged in a recent assembly in the house of the people -EX employed house - to which We had participated - where the position on deadline 25 prevailed April, which implies that until then nothing is done except meetings.

On April 4 at 6 pm a meeting at the Slai Cobas headquarters is convened to decide and organize upcoming initiatives.

Ex intervention ex ilva Slai Cobas:

"THE Zionists, philosionists and their allies are skilled to mystify the meaning of the terms, a
description: In the Palestine of Palestine yesterday, new important objectives were brought to the companions of the Palestine
author: fannyhill
